name: Find Cats With Friends
description:
Gather your friends and embark on an exhilarating adventure to a mysterious island where the law is set by the cozy purring creatures – cats! You are brave pirates who accidentally found yourselves on this enigmatic island, and now your team must collect a very unusual loot: a hundred mischievous kitties.

In Find Cats With Friends your main goal is to collect each of the one hundred cats scattered throughout the island and bring them to the specially designated spot – the cat box. However, pirates must be prepared that these little rascals love to hide in the most unpredictable places: under bushes, in tree hollows, on top of hills, or even on the masts of abandoned pirate ships.

Along your journey, you will undoubtedly find various tools and items that will aid you in your quest for cats. Use them wisely to gather all the cats as quickly as possible!

Against the backdrop of beautiful tropical nature, interacting with local inhabitants, you and your friends will be immersed in a world filled with joy and fun.

Gather your team (up to 6 players) and embark on an exciting pirate adventure in cooperative multiplayer mode, where the ultimate reward will be your ability to collectively find and bring all the cats on board your ship! Good luck, cat questers!
